name: Phylactery of Negative Channeling
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic Items/Wondrous Items/Phylactery of Negative Channeling

Construction.Requirements: Craft Wondrous Item, creator must be a 10th-level cleric

sections.body: This item is a boon to any character able to channel negative energy, increasing the amount of damage dealt to living creatures by +2d6. This also increases the amount of damage healed by undead creatures.
sections.name: Description
